[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/inherit/club_owned_room.c

This is the same as an owned room, but it is controlled by a club instead.

Written by Pinkfish

Started 16th of May

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/inherit/owned_room.c

Method index

query_club_controller()
This method returns the club controller for the club.
query_owned_id()
This method sets the owned id to use for this room.
set_club_controller(string)
This method sets the club controller of the room.
set_owned_id(string)
This method sets the owned id to use for this room.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
query_club_controller
string query_club_controller()
This method returns the club controller for the club.

Returns:
the club controller
query_owned_id
string query_owned_id()
This method sets the owned id to use for this room. The id is then used to query the club controller to see who owns the room.

Parameters:
id - the id to set the room to use
See also:
query_owned_id()
set_club_controller
void set_club_controller(string club_controller)
This method sets the club controller of the room.

Parameters:
club_controller - the club controller
set_owned_id
void set_owned_id(string id)
This method sets the owned id to use for this room. The id is then used to query the club controller to see who owns the room.

Parameters:
id - the id to set the room to use
See also:
query_owned_id()
